app.about.title: Discover New Experience!
app.about.description: Improve your business and get much more profitable offers by using OmKurir's business services. Upgrade your personal account to OmKurir's business account to get many benefits and a pleasant experience from just sending goods.
app.about.0: Curated Delivery Expert delivery. Off-the-charts customer service. Choose the delivery solution that’s right for your business.
app.about.1: Responsive Support You and your customers get text updates every step of the way. And, you can always talk to a real person.
app.about.2: Guarantee Rates No upcharges. No surprises. Just one reasonable fixed rate.
app.aboutus.text.0: OmKurir offers the talents of fully-vetted Delivery Pros with the latest in point-to-point technology. All for reliable curated deliveries from your register to the customer’s room. Our expert services offers retail businesses, a seamless same-day delivery experience that increases your big-ticket transactions and satisfies your customers’ high standards.
app.aboutus.text.1: We are see that the growth of social commerce (online shops on social media) is very significant compared to e-commerce marketplace users in Indonesia. Even mostly those e commerce sellers is start with a social commerce.
app.aboutus.text.2: Currently, social media is no longer just a socializing platform, but has turned into a buying and selling platform. To connect buyers and sellers, the currently available delivery service, apart from being expensive, also does not provide a cash on delivery feature except for marketplace users.
app.contactUs.title: Contact Us
app.contactUs.description: Got a question or comment? A PICKUP rep is standing by. Need something delivered?
app.contactUs.formdescription: Contact us today to get your customers’ purchases from your business to their home with same day and scheduled delivery. Want to deliver for PICKUP? Sign Up Now
